column1:
module ApplicationHelper
        # Returns the full title on a per-page basis.
        def full_title(page_title)
  	      base_title = 'Ruby on Rails Tutorial Sample App'
  	      if page_title.empty?
  	        base_title
  	      else
  	        ""#{base_title} | #{page_title}""
  	      end
        end
    end
